body: After you use grad_scope for the scope usages after WithControlDependencies, you will need to `return grad_scope.status()`. It will automatically get the status of `scope` if that was an error.
body_html: After you use grad_scope for the scope usages after WithControlDependencies, you will need to return grad_scope.status(). It will automatically get the status of scope if that was an error.
body_text: After you use grad_scope for the scope usages after WithControlDependencies, you will need to return grad_scope.status(). It will automatically get the status of scope if that was an error.
